All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Enum Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityLocation
    The ActivityLocation class represents a location within the game where activities are.
    ActivityType
    Enum representing types of activities in the game.
    Avatar
    The Avatar class represents the player's character in the game.
    Button
    CHANGELOG : NEW CLASS The Button class generates Buttons that are used within the screen classes.
    Core
    The Core class represents the core functionality of the game, managing game state, interactions, and scoring.
    EndScreen
    CHANGELOG: UPDATED METHOD ADDDED STREAKS FUNCTIONALITY The EndScreen class represents the screen displayed at the end of the game.
    Energy
    Represents the energy resource in the game.
    ExitConditions
    Enum representing the conditions of a request to a resource.
    Font
    CHANGELOG : NEW CLASS The Font class generates the games font that are used within the screen classes.
    HeslingtonHustle
    The main class representing the game, extending LibGDX's Game class.
    HUD
    The HUD class displays game information on the screen, including: - Energy level - Time remaining - Number of times studied today - Number of times eaten today - Current day
    InteractionPopup
    The InteractionPopup class represents a pop-up message displayed when a player is within range of an interaction.
    Leaderboard
    CHANGELOG: NEW CLASS The Leaderboard class handles all backend logic for the leaderboard requirements.
    LeaderboardScreen
    CHANGELOG: NEW CLASS ADDED CLASS TO IMPLEMENT LEADERBOARD SCREEN This class represents the games Leaderboard Screen.
    MenuScreen
    The MenuScreen class represents the screen where the game menu is displayed.
    NameScreen
    CHANGELOG : NEW CLASS This class handles the screen in which the user enters their name upon game completion
    PlayerAnimator
    CHANGELOG: UPDATED CLASS ADDED ATTRIBUTES TO STORE SPRITE SHEET PNGS The PlayerAnimator class manages animation of the player character when moving.
    PlayScreen
    CHANGELOG: UPDATED CLASS The PlayScreen class represents the games screen where the gameplay is.
    ResourceBase
    The ResourceBase interface defines methods for managing game resources.
    ResourceExitConditions
    Represents the combination of exit conditions and resource types returned from the core to the GUI, providing visual cues for why an attempted interaction failed, if applicable.
    ResourceTypes
    Enum representing different types of resources in the game.
    ScreenId
    Enum used to identify different screens within the game.
    Time
    The Time class manages time in the game, representing a day with a specific duration (16 hours).
    TutorialScreen
    This class represents the games tutorial screen.
    UserScore
    This class acts as a data type that stores a users playerName and their game score
